name: Winter
storyline: One day a child was born who was different from the others. His heart was as hot as the breath of a dragon, he was incredibly kind, that the gods took notice. But because of this, there was a loss of power, from which the hunter man went crazy and began to send people eternal grief. The water man took away all the powers of the frost, but the frost imprisoned the soul of this child in a totem, so that the child could defeat the merman with his army, so the water killed mokosh, god nature and life. But such forces of frost were taken away, the child of fire will be punished for any offense. And since the forces of frost took the child of fire, he will try to restore him every day, including his power.
summary: Face mythical creatures from ancient mythologies face to face, create an army and fight back before winter swallows you.
